    On this page

    • Overview
    • Usage
    • Parameters
    • Example(s)

    $guildNames

    $guildNames will return the guide names your bot is in.

    Usage

    $guildNames[sep?]

    Parameters

    FieldTypeDescriptionRequired
    sep?stringSeparator to separate multiple returned values.false

    Example(s)

    This will return the names of the guilds your bot is in and separate it by a comma:

    bot.command({
  name: "guildNames",
  code: `
  $guildNames[, ]
  `,
});
    Edit page
